issues.description: Ch4 timeline shows 'November 19 (Day 3)' but Ch6 shows 'Three weeks after Chapter 1' which would be ~November 8 or later if Ch1 is Nov 17-18. The progression from Ch4 (Day 3) to Ch6 (Three weeks later) creates a timeline gap.

issues.description: Ch4 state file lists Viktor's apartment as '2703' (floor 27), but Ch17 mentions 'elevator to his floor malfunctioned' and he's described as needing to climb to an 'eighteenth floor' in some references. Need to verify Viktor's actual floor.

issues.description: Ch15 mentions Signal group dissolution from 89→34 members, but Ch17 references 'ninety-two' people at risk. Minor numerical inconsistency.
issues.suggestion: Align final Signal group membership count. Use 89 consistently as the peak membership.

issues.description: Temperature progression shows 19°C in Ch1, then 18.5°C in Ch5, but Ch2 describes Aisha's apartment as '22-23°C' and mentions Saga's might be '18°C'. The 19°C→18.5°C escalation is good, but the intermediate reference to 'possibly 18°C' in Ch2 creates confusion.
issues.suggestion: Make temperature escalation clear: Ch1-2 = 19°C, Ch3-4 = 19°C, Ch5 = 18.5°C (escalation after resistance identified), then restored to perfect after enrollment in Ch20.
